General: - Urn NW lead requirement increased from 8% to 10%

Shiv: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow cast range increased from 13m to 14m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow rage per weapon damage increased from 0.015 to 0.017
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow drain rate reduced from 0.3 to 0.25
Bebop: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb stacks no longer decrease on death

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb now gives stacks based on dying heroes hurt by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb damage with a 12 second buffer (previously anyone hit by the bomb would automatically grant stacks)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb damage per stack increased from 3% to 5%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb spirit power damage scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb T1 improved from -7.5s to -8s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb cooldown reduced from 19s to 18s
